cafe

Class Coffee

  • java.lang.Object
    • cafe.MenuItem
      • cafe.Coffee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Customizable

    public class Coffee
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
    An instance of this class is a menu item in an order. This class must extend MenuItem class and implement the Customizable interface. This class also takes care of the size of the coffee, addIns, and price.
    Author:
    Prachiti Atigre, Ujani Patel
